title: What Does Amazon's BSR mean? || Amazon BSR

tactics.name: BSR Niche Analysis
tactics.description: Use BSR rankings to identify profitable niches by comparing subcategory performance
steps: Prioritize niches with low BSR (recent sales)
Avoid products with no BSR (zero sales)
caveats: BSR may not reflect new products
source_quotes: the lower the ratings the more recently the product is sold

heuristics.name: Recent Sales Indicator
heuristics.condition: If BSR is below 500,000 then prioritize
source_quotes: lower rating of about two hundred thousand in the clothing and shoes rally means that it has recently sold

claims.statement: Amazon's BSR is calculated based on sales data and updated hourly
source_quotes: amazon's algorithm automatically generates this number and assigns it to a product based on its most recent and historical sales data

niche_patterns.description: Target specific audience needs with niche constraints
niche_patterns.why_it_works: Combines identity (target audience), problem (unmet need), and constraint (specific criteria)
source_quotes: make sure you're looking at the bsr ratings as well because the lower the ratings the more recently the product is sold
